exclusion: Tap the top or bottom of the rocker.
inclusion: Tap the top or bottom of the rocker.
overview: Transform any home into a smart home with the Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch. The Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch enables wireless control of on/off and dim functions of hard-wired incandescent lighting. The dimmer switch replaces your current light switch, uses your existing wiring, and provides Z-Wave wireless and in-wall control of overhead lighting. Use the dimmer feature to customize the lighting output and create the perfect ambiance for any room. Providing ultimate flexibility, the Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch allows you to operate the switch by itself or easily integrate the switch with two-way, three-way or four-way wiring configurations by adding the Jasco Auxiliary switch for Z-Wave. Two-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from one location. Three-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from two separate locations. Four-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from three separate locations. The Jasco Auxiliary Switch for Z-Wave is required for three-way or four-way installations. The dimmer switch includes an LED indicator light to easily locate the switch in a dark room. Take control of your home lighting with Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Controls!

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Night Light
parameters.overview:
Defines the behavior of the blue LED.

Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

options.label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameters.label: Invert Switch
parameters.overview:
Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom  of the switch to ON.

Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.

parameters.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameters.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1,  then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 <br>seconds the dim level will change.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
parameters.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
